topics.title: Arrays & Hashing
topics.description: Master fundamental array manipulation and hashing techniques

problems.title: Two Sum
problems.description: Find two numbers that add up to target

problems.title: Contains Duplicate
problems.description: Find if array contains any duplicates

problems.title: Group Anagrams
problems.description: Group strings that are anagrams of each other

problems.title: Top K Frequent Elements
problems.description: Find k most frequent elements in array

topics.title: Two Pointers
topics.description: Learn to solve problems using the two-pointer technique

problems.title: Valid Palindrome
problems.description: Check if string is palindrome after converting to lowercase and removing non-alphanumeric characters

problems.title: Container With Most Water
problems.description: Find two lines that together with x-axis forms a container that holds the most water

problems.title: Remove Duplicates
problems.description: Remove duplicates from sorted array in-place

problems.title: Three Sum
problems.description: Find all unique triplets that sum to zero
